name: cannibalistic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
used to describe a person who eats human flesh, or an animal that eats the flesh of animals of its own type: a cannibalistic killer Spiders are very cannibalistic. See
cannibal
More examplesFewer examplesThe novel is about a cannibalistic, mass-murdering psychiatrist. Historians dispute the tribe's reported cannibalistic tendencies.Crabs are cannibalistic - the hard ones eat the soft ones, which have shed their shells to grow. Cannibalistic feeding, whereby cows ate the remains of other cattle, is now banned.
